Key Match Events: Boston tied an NBA record with 29 3′s
Pre-Game Insights: Jayson Tatum grabbed a microphone to say a few words to the fans
Owner Wyc Grousbeck handed out the oversized rings
Paul Pierce, Kevin Garnett, and Ray Allen brought out the 2024 trophy
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum said, 'Let’s do it again'
Coach Joe Mazzulla said, 'The biggest thing I’m proud of was the mindset of the guys: They weren’t stuck in the past.'
Jaylen Brown said, 'My name – alongside my teammates’ – is going to be etched down in Celtics history'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pregame ceremony included a video tracing the team's title journey
The sold-out crowd arrived early to see the Celtics take the court in special warm-up jackets
The banner raising ceremony was a highlight for the players
Others: The ring is encircled with the years of the franchise’s 18 NBA titles
The outer bezel has 18 larger diamonds for the team’s 18 titles
